DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of dronabinol MDI for the acute treatment of moderate to severe migraine headache.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Dronabinol Metered Dose Inhaler (MDI) in Acute Treatment of Migraine Headache
DOC.criteria: Male or female subjects 18 to 65 years, inclusive, with clinically diagnosed migraine with or without aura based on International Headache Society criteria Subjects who experience migraine with prolonged aura; familiar hemiplegic migraine; migrainous infarction or basilar migraine; and those with greater than eight migraine attacks per month and/or greater than 14 migraine days per month.
DOC.keyword: migraine headache with or without aura
